name: Rip Deeper
description:
The dead are coming back to life, disturbing Patrick the gravedigger's sleep..! In order to secure the cemetary the dead needs to be burried deeper !

This game is a submission to the Ludum Dare 48, with the theme "Deeper and Deeper". This game is playable with mouse or xBox controllers but we recommend the joystick which is more pleasant

Gameplay :
  • Fixed a bug affecting keyboard control
  • Fixed a bug, now it is no longer possible to lay earth if an enemy is not buried

  • Fixed source audio which prevented some are from being played
